Name: The Lion King
Credit: Dir: Roger Allers, Rob Minkoff With: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones
Outline: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

Name: Sholay
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Drama | Musical | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Ramesh Sippy With: Dharmendra, Sanjeev Kumar, Hema Malini
Outline: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture him.

Name: Singin' in the Rain
Credit: Dir: Stanley Donen, Gene Kelly With: Gene Kelly, Donald O'Connor, Debbie Reynolds
Outline: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

Name: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
Credit: Dir: Aditya Chopra With: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Amrish Puri
Outline: A young man and woman - both of Indian descent but born and raised in Britain - fall in love during a trip to Switzerland. However, the girl's traditional father takes her back to India to fulfill a betrothal promise.

Name: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
Credit: Dir: Ashutosh Gowariker With: Aamir Khan, Gracy Singh, Rachel Shelley
Outline: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

Name: The Wizard of Oz
Credit: Dir: Victor Fleming With: Judy Garland, Frank Morgan, Ray Bolger
Outline: Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home.

Name: Pink Floyd The Wall
Credit: Dir: Alan Parker With: Bob Geldof, Christine Hargreaves, James Laurenson
Outline: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

Name: Beauty and the Beast
Credit: Dir: Gary Trousdale, Kirk Wise With: Paige O'Hara, Robby Benson, Jesse Corti
Outline: Belle, whose father is imprisoned by the Beast, offers herself instead, unaware her captor to be an enchanted prince.

Name: The Nightmare Before Christmas
Credit: Dir: Henry Selick With: Danny Elfman, Chris Sarandon, Catherine O'Hara
Outline: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but doesn't quite understand the concept.

Name: Duck Soup
Credit: Dir: Leo McCarey With: Groucho Marx, Harpo Marx, Chico Marx
Outline: Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.

Name: Aladdin
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Musical | Romance
Credit: Dir: Ron Clements, John Musker With: Scott Weinger, Robin Williams, Linda Larkin
Outline: When a street urchin vies for the love of a beautiful princess, he uses a genie's magic power to make himself off as a prince in order to marry her.

Name: Dancer in the Dark
Credit: Dir: Lars von Trier With: BjÃ¶rk, Catherine Deneuve, David Morse
Outline: An east European girl goes to America with her young son, expecting it to be like a Hollywood film.

Name: The Sound of Music
Credit: Dir: Robert Wise With: Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer, Eleanor Parker
Outline: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

Name: Fiddler on the Roof
Credit: Dir: Norman Jewison With: Topol, Norma Crane, Leonard Frey
Outline: In prerevolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant contends with marrying off three of his daughters while growing antisemitic sentiment threatens his village.

Name: My Fair Lady
Credit: Dir: George Cukor With: Audrey Hepburn, Rex Harrison, Stanley Holloway
Outline: A misogynistic and snobbish phonetics professor agrees to a wager that he can take a flower girl and make her presentable in high society.

Name: Veer-Zaara
Credit: Dir: Yash Chopra With: Shah Rukh Khan, Preity Zinta, Rani Mukerji
Outline: The story of the love between Veer Pratap Singh, an Indian, and Zaara Hayaat Khan, a Pakistani...a love so great it knows no boundaries...

Name: Cabaret
Credit: Dir: Bob Fosse With: Liza Minnelli, Michael York, Helmut Griem
Outline: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

Name: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
Credit: Dir: Karan Johar With: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Rani Mukerji
Outline: During their college years, Anjali was in love with her best-friend Rahul, but he had eyes only for Tina. Years later, Rahul and the now-deceased Tina's eight-year-old daughter attempts to reunite her father and Anjali.

Name: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
Credit: Dir: Mel Stuart With: Gene Wilder, Jack Albertson, Peter Ostrum
Outline: Charlie receives a golden ticket to a factory, his sweet tooth wants going into the lushing candy, it turns out there's an adventure in everything.

Name: Tangled
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Musical | Romance
Credit: Dir: Nathan Greno, Byron Howard With: Mandy Moore, Zachary Levi, Donna Murphy
Outline: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

Name: Hedwig and the Angry Inch
Credit: Dir: John Cameron Mitchell With: John Cameron Mitchell, Miriam Shor, Stephen Trask
Outline: A transsexual punk-rock girl from East Berlin tours the U.S. with her band as she tells her life story and follows the former lover/band-mate who stole her songs.

Name: Mary Poppins
Credit: Dir: Robert Stevenson With: Julie Andrews, Dick Van Dyke, David Tomlinson
Outline: A magic nanny comes to work for a cold banker's unhappy family.

Name: South Park: Bigger Longer & Uncut
Credit: Dir: Trey Parker With: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Mary Kay Bergman
Outline: When the four boys see an R-rated movie featuring Canadians Terrance & Phillip, they are pronounced "corrupted", and their parents pressure the United States to wage war against Canada.

Name: A Hard Day's Night
Credit: Dir: Richard Lester With: John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison
Outline: A 'typical' day in the life of the Beatles, including many of their famous songs.

Name: The Muppet Christmas Carol
Credit: Dir: Brian Henson With: Michael Caine, Dave Goelz, Steve Whitmire
Outline: The Muppet characters tell their version of the classic tale of an old and bitter miser's redemption on Christmas Eve.

Name: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
Credit: Dir: William Cottrell, David Hand With: Adriana Caselotti, Harry Stockwell, Lucille La Verne
Outline: Snow White, pursued by a jealous queen, hides with the Dwarfs, but the queen learns of this and prepares to feed her a poison apple.

Name: Moulin Rouge!
Credit: Dir: Baz Luhrmann With: Nicole Kidman, Ewan McGregor, John Leguizamo
Outline: A poet falls for a beautiful courtesan whom a jealous duke covets in this stylish musical, with music drawn from familiar 20th century sources.

Name: The Jungle Book
Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Reitherman With: Phil Harris, Sebastian Cabot, Louis Prima
Outline: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

Name: Les Misérables
Credit: Dir: Tom Hooper With: Hugh Jackman, Russell Crowe, Anne Hathaway
Outline: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

Name: West Side Story
Credit: Dir: Jerome Robbins, Robert Wise With: Natalie Wood, George Chakiris, Richard Beymer
Outline: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

Name: Frozen
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Musical
Credit: Dir: Chris Buck, Jennifer Lee With: Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Jonathan Groff
Outline: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister, Anna, teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

Name: The Little Mermaid
Credit: Dir: Ron Clements, John Musker With: Jodi Benson, Samuel E. Wright, Rene Auberjonois
Outline: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain with an unscrupulous sea-witch in order to meet a human prince on land.

Name: The Meaning of Life
Credit: Dir: Terry Jones, Terry Gilliam With: John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle
Outline: The comedy team takes a look at life in all its stages in their own uniquely silly way.

Name: Hair
Credit: Dir: Milos Forman With: John Savage, Treat Williams, Beverly D'Angelo
Outline: Claude leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly indoctrinated into the youth subculture and subsequently drafted.

Name: Mulan
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Family | Fantasy | Musical | War
Credit: Dir: Tony Bancroft, Barry Cook With: Ming-Na Wen, Eddie Murphy, BD Wong
Outline: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

Name: Pinocchio
Credit: Dir: Norman Ferguson, T. Hee With: Dickie Jones, Christian Rub, Mel Blanc
Outline: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

Name: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham...
Credit: Dir: Karan Johar With: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Amitabh Bachchan
Outline: Yashvardhan Raichand lives a very wealthy lifestyle along with his wife, Nandini, and two sons, Rahul and Rohan...

Name: Across the Universe
Credit: Dir: Julie Taymor With: Evan Rachel Wood, Jim Sturgess, Joe Anderson
Outline: The music of the Beatles and the Vietnam War form the backdrop for the romance between an upper-class American girl and a poor Liverpudlian artist.

Name: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
Credit: Dir: Tim Burton With: Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Alan Rickman
Outline: The infamous story of Benjamin Barker, AKA Sweeney Todd, who sets up a barber shop down in London which is the basis for a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett. Based on the hit Broadway musical.

Name: Alice in Wonderland
Credit: Dir: Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson With: Kathryn Beaumont, Ed Wynn, Richard Haydn
Outline: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

Name: Labyrinth
Credit: Dir: Jim Henson With: David Bowie, Jennifer Connelly, Toby Froud
Outline: A selfish 16-year old girl is given 13 hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King.

Name: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
Credit: Dir: Jim Sharman With: Tim Curry, Susan Sarandon, Barry Bostwick
Outline: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

Name: Corpse Bride
Credit: Dir: Tim Burton, Mike Johnson With: Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Emily Watson
Outline: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

Name: The Phantom of the Opera
Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Gerard Butler, Emmy Rossum, Patrick Wilson
Outline: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured musical genius who lives beneath the Paris OpÃ©ra House.

Name: Sleeping Beauty
Credit: Dir: Clyde Geronimi With: Mary Costa, Bill Shirley, Eleanor Audley
Outline: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.

Name: Cinderella
Credit: Dir: Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson With: Ilene Woods, James MacDonald, Eleanor Audley
Outline: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq, and from her Fairy Godmother.

Name: Dumbo
Credit: Dir: Samuel Armstrong, Norman Ferguson With: Sterling Holloway, Edward Brophy, James Baskett
Outline: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

Name: Hercules
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Musical | Romance
Credit: Dir: Ron Clements, John Musker With: Tate Donovan, Susan Egan, James Woods
Outline: The son of the Greek Gods Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

Name: Grease
Credit: Dir: Randal Kleiser With: John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing
Outline: Good girl Sandy and greaser Danny fell in love over the summer. But when they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

Name: The Sword in the Stone
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Musical
Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Reitherman With: Rickie Sorensen, Sebastian Cabot, Karl Swenson
Outline: The wizard Merlin teaches a young boy who is destined to be King Arthur.

Name: The Doors
Credit: Dir: Oliver Stone With: Val Kilmer, Meg Ryan, Kyle MacLachlan
Outline: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

Name: Chicago
Credit: Dir: Rob Marshall With: RenÃ©e Zellweger, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Richard Gere
Outline: Murderesses Velma Kelly and Roxie Hart find themselves on death row together and fight for the fame that will keep them from the gallows in 1920s Chicago.

Name: The Muppets
Credit: Dir: James Bobin With: Amy Adams, Jason Segel, Chris Cooper
Outline: A Muppet fanatic with some help from his two human compatriots must regroup the Muppet gang to stop an avaricious oil mogul from taking down one of their precious life-longing treasures.

Name: The Princess and the Frog
Credit: Dir: Ron Clements, John Musker With: Anika Noni Rose, Keith David, Oprah Winfrey
Outline: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

Name: Enchanted
Genre: Animation | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Musical | Romance
Credit: Dir: Kevin Lima With: Amy Adams, Susan Sarandon, James Marsden
Outline: A princess, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York by an evil queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

Name: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
Credit: Dir: Aditya Chopra With: Shah Rukh Khan, Vinay Pathak, Anushka Sharma
Outline: A middle-aged man who lost his love for life rediscovers it by assuming a new identity in order to rekindle the romantic spark in his marriage.

Name: Anastasia
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Drama | Family | Fantasy | Musical | Mystery | Romance
Credit: Dir: Don Bluth, Gary Goldman With: Meg Ryan, John Cusack, Christopher Lloyd
Outline: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

Name: Rent
Credit: Dir: Chris Columbus With: Taye Diggs, Wilson Jermaine Heredia, Rosario Dawson
Outline: This is the film version of the Pulitzer and Tony Award winning musical about Bohemians in the East Village of New York City struggling with life, love and AIDS, and the impacts they have on America.

Name: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
Credit: Dir: Robert Stevenson With: Angela Lansbury, David Tomlinson, Roddy McDowall
Outline: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical conman search for the missing component to a magic spell useful to the defense of Britain.

Name: The Prince of Egypt
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Biography | Drama | Family | Fantasy | Musical
Credit: Dir: Brenda Chapman, Steve Hickner With: Val Kilmer, Ralph Fiennes, Michelle Pfeiffer
Outline: An Egyptian prince learns of his identity as a Hebrew and, later his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

Name: Rio
Credit: Dir: Carlos Saldanha With: Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway, George Lopez
Outline: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.

Name: An American Tail
Credit: Dir: Don Bluth With: Dom DeLuise, Christopher Plummer, Erica Yohn
Outline: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

Name: Little Shop of Horrors
Credit: Dir: Frank Oz With: Rick Moranis, Ellen Greene, Vincent Gardenia
Outline: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

Name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
Credit: Dir: Gary Trousdale, Kirk Wise With: Demi Moore, Jason Alexander, Tom Hulce
Outline: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

Name: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
Credit: Dir: Ken Hughes With: Dick Van Dyke, Sally Ann Howes, Lionel Jeffries
Outline: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

Name: Everyone Says I Love You
Credit: Dir: Woody Allen With: Woody Allen, Goldie Hawn, Julia Roberts
Outline: A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a shaky marriage while her half sister gets engaged.

Name: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
Credit: Dir: Liam Lynch With: Jack Black, Kyle Gass, JR Reed
Outline: In Venice Beach, naive Midwesterner JB bonds with local slacker KG and they form the rock band Tenacious D. Setting out to become the world's greatest band is no easy feat, so they set out to steal what could be the answer to their prayers -- a magical guitar pick housed in a rock-and-roll museum some 300 miles away.

Name: A Goofy Movie
Credit: Dir: Kevin Lima With: Bill Farmer, Jason Marsden, Jim Cummings
Outline: When Max makes an preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

Name: Hairspray
Credit: Dir: Adam Shankman With: John Travolta, Queen Latifah, Nikki Blonsky
Outline: Pleasantly plump teenager Tracy Turnblad teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

Name: James and the Giant Peach
Credit: Dir: Henry Selick With: Paul Terry, Joanna Lumley, Pete Postlethwaite
Outline: An orphan with terrible aunts for guardians, befriends human like bugs who live inside a giant peach, who take the boy on a journey to New York City.

Name: Oliver & Company
Credit: Dir: George Scribner With: Joey Lawrence, Billy Joel, Cheech Marin
Outline: A lost and alone kitten joins a gang of dogs engaged in petty larceny in New York.

Name: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
Credit: Dir: Mel Brooks With: Cary Elwes, Richard Lewis, Roger Rees
Outline: A spoof of Robin Hood in general and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves in particular.

Name: Pocahontas
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Drama | Family | History | Musical | Romance
Credit: Dir: Mike Gabriel, Eric Goldberg With: Mel Gibson, Linda Hunt, Christian Bale
Outline: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.

Name: Om Shanti Om
Genre: Action | Comedy | Drama | Musical | Romance | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Farah Khan With: Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, Arjun Rampal
Outline: In the 1970s, Om, an aspiring actor, is murdered, but is immediately reincarnated into the present day. He attempts to discover the mystery of his demise and find Shanti, the love of his previous life.

Name: Dreamgirls
Credit: Dir: Bill Condon With: BeyoncÃ© Knowles, Jamie Foxx, Eddie Murphy
Outline: A trio of black female soul singers cross over to the pop charts in the early 1960s, facing their own personal struggles along the way.

Name: Annie
Credit: Dir: John Huston With: Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett
Outline: A young orphan girl's adventures in finding a family that will take her.

Name: Cry-Baby
Credit: Dir: John Waters With: Johnny Depp, Ricki Lake, Amy Locane
Outline: In 1950s Baltimore, a bad-boy with a heart of gold wins the love of a good-girl, whose boyfriend sets out for revenge.

Name: The Producers
Credit: Dir: Susan Stroman With: Nathan Lane, Matthew Broderick, Uma Thurman
Outline: After putting together another Broadway flop, down-on-his-luck producer Max Bialystock teams up with timid accountant Leo Bloom in a get-rich-quick scheme to put on the world's worst show.

Name: Rio 2
Credit: Dir: Carlos Saldanha With: Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway, Jemaine Clement
Outline: It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jewel and their three kids after they're hurtled from Rio de Janeiro to the wilds of the Amazon. As Blu tries to fit in, he goes beak-to-beak with the vengeful Nigel, and meets his father-in-law.

Name: Mamma Mia!
Credit: Dir: Phyllida Lloyd With: Meryl Streep, Pierce Brosnan, Amanda Seyfried
Outline: The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular '70s group ABBA.

Name: Evita
Credit: Dir: Alan Parker With: Madonna, Jonathan Pryce, Antonio Banderas
Outline: The hit musical based on the life of Evita Duarte, a B-picture Argentinian actress who eventually became the wife of Argentinian president Juan PerÃ³n, and the most beloved and hated woman in Argentina.

Name: Step Up 2: The Streets
Credit: Dir: Jon M. Chu With: Robert Hoffman, Briana Evigan, Cassie Ventura
Outline: Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.

Name: Into the Woods
Credit: Dir: Rob Marshall With: Anna Kendrick, Meryl Streep, Chris Pine
Outline: A witch tasks a childless baker and his wife with procuring magical items from classic fairy tales to reverse the curse put on their family tree.

Name: Happy Feet 2
Credit: Dir: George Miller, Gary Eck With: Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Pink
Outline: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

Name: Rock of Ages
Credit: Dir: Adam Shankman With: Julianne Hough, Diego Boneta, Tom Cruise
Outline: A small town girl and a city boy meet on the Sunset Strip, while pursuing their Hollywood dreams.

Name: Nine
Credit: Dir: Rob Marshall With: Daniel Day-Lewis, Marion Cotillard, PenÃ©lope Cruz
Outline: Famous film director Guido Contini struggles to find harmony in his professional and personal lives, as he engages in dramatic relationships with his wife, his mistress, his muse, his agent, and his mother.

Name: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
Genre: Comedy | Drama | Family | Music | Musical | Romance
Credit: Dir: Kenny Ortega With: Zac Efron, Vanessa Hudgens, Ashley Tisdale
Outline: As seniors in high school, Troy and Gabriella struggle with the idea of being separated from one another as college approaches. Along with the rest of the Wildcats, they stage a spring musical to address their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.

Name: Grease 2
Credit: Dir: Patricia Birch With: Michelle Pfeiffer, Maxwell Caulfield, Lorna Luft
Outline: An English student at a 1960's American high school has to prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.
